content: In an HTML page, how can the sentence "My friend bought a new car" be rewritten in passive form?

In passive voice, the focus is shifted from the subject to the object of the sentence. The sentence "My friend bought a new car" can be rewritten in passive form as: "A new car was bought by my friend." To include this in an HTML page, you could simply use a paragraph tag like this: ```html

A new car was bought by my friend.

```
